verbs.description: [ARG1: I] [V: am] [ARG2: skeptical] [ARGM-CAU: because the Kim / Trump Summit is between two known egocentrics who have little or no respect for each other and the rest of the world] .
I am skeptical because [ARG1: the Kim / Trump Summit] [V: is] [ARG2: between two known egocentrics who have little or no respect for each other and the rest of the world] .
I am skeptical because the Kim / Trump Summit is between two [V: known] [ARG1: egocentrics] who have little or no respect for each other and the rest of the world .
I am skeptical because the Kim / Trump Summit is between [ARG0: two known egocentrics] [R-ARG0: who] [V: have] [ARG1: little or no respect for each other and the rest of the world] .
